lines: 1. Ndi a u lilela Ida kha nne, Ida-ha Mutshidzi;
Ndi a u dzindela Ida kha nne, Ida-ha Mutshidzi;
Ndo vha ndo xela ngei dzithavhani, nda vha kule na hayani;
Khumise ndi vhuyele hayani, Ida-ha Mutshidzi.
2. A thi na vhuawelo vhusiku, Ida-ha Mutshidzi;
Wa ndavhelesa ndi n ga di tshila, Ida-ha Mutshidzi.
3. Ndi tshimbila ndaila dzi kondaho, Ida-ha Mutshidzi;
Mato anga a lilala khaâ€™we, Ida-ha Mutshidzi.
4. U si sande u di-nyadza hanga, Ida-ha Mutshidzi;
Ndi a lila apfa thabelo yanga, Ida-ha Mutshidzi.
